title.narrative: Promoting and Protecting Women Migrant Workers' labour and human rights: Engaging with international, national human rights mechanisms to enhance accountability.

description.narrative: To promote Women Migrant Workers (WMW) Rights - protect them against exploitation - exclusion at all stages of migration. Specific objective(s): (1) To strengthen strategic international human rights mechanisms, national human rights institutions, parliaments, governments to ensure accountability to WMWs at all stages; (2) To strengthen WMWs organizations to effectively engage with these mechanisms - governments to ensure greater accountability at all stages of migration.

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
